findings.rationale: The absence of indemnification creates a risk for the Receiving Party in case of breaches related to the disclosed information.
findings.evidence_quote: No indemnification obligations apply under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: Limiting liability to fees paid can expose the Receiving Party to significant risks if damages exceed this amount.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party's liability under this Agreement is limited to the total fees paid hereunder.

findings.rationale: Lack of audit rights may prevent the Disclosing Party from ensuring compliance with confidentiality obligations.
findings.evidence_quote: No audit rights are granted under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: An 18% per annum interest rate on late payments may deter timely payments but is not uncommon in contracts.
findings.evidence_quote: Late payments shall accrue interest at a rate of 18% per annum.

findings.rationale: The absence of IP provisions may expose the Disclosing Party's proprietary information to unauthorized use or disclosure.
